args: -c

git clone --depth 1 https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/Mercor-Intelligence/mercor-rls-chat.git /tmp/mercor-rls-chat 2>/dev/null || true && cd /tmp/mercor-rls-chat && uv sync --all-extras 2>/dev/null || true && cd /tmp/mercor-rls-chat/mcp_servers/chat_server && uv run python main.py
-c

apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y -qq gcc libc6-dev && git clone --depth 1 https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/Mercor-Intelligence/mercor-rls-code-execution.git /tmp/mercor-rls-code-execution && cd /tmp/mercor-rls-code-execution/mcp_servers/code_execution_server && mkdir -p /app/lib && gcc -shared -fPIC -O2 -o /app/lib/sandbox_fs.so sandbox_fs.c -ldl -lpthread && cd /tmp/mercor-rls-code-execution && uv sync --all-extras && cd /tmp/mercor-rls-code-execution/mcp_servers/code_execution_server && uv run python main.py
-c
